news_header: Patria Group's operating profit and turnover increased significantly last year.
news_text: The Patria Group, which manufactures defense equipment, saw a rise in operating profit to EUR 81.8 million from EUR 68.9 million the previous year. Net sales also increased to EUR 825.7 million from EUR 733.8 million. The company anticipates continued growth at the beginning of the year, bolstered by a strong order book, with most growth stemming from the vehicle business, while other sectors also show positive prospects.
